body_html:
So the issue is that running TensorFlow sessions seems to affect the random numbers that numpy generates.

/CC @zffchen78 do you know if this is expected? IMO this shouldn't occur, because TensorFlow should only use it's own seed for randomness.
body_text:
So the issue is that running TensorFlow sessions seems to affect the random numbers that numpy generates.
/CC @zffchen78 do you know if this is expected? IMO this shouldn't occur, because TensorFlow should only use it's own seed for randomness.
body:
So the issue is that running TensorFlow sessions seems to affect the random numbers that numpy generates.

/CC @zffchen78 do you know if this is expected? IMO this shouldn't occur, because TensorFlow should only use it's own seed for randomness.
